summary: MY 2015 CADILLAC SRX WHEEL CLADDING,HUB CAPS, ARE COMING OFF.  TOOK TO DEALER, HENDRICK CADILLAC NORFOLK VA., BECAUSE THE CLADDING WAS RATTALING AND STARTING TO COME OF THE WHEEL.  THEY SAID THAT THE WHEELS WERE NOT COVERED BY THE MANUFACTURES WARRANTY.  WHEN THE CLADDING, HUB CAPS, WERE MANUFACTURED THE ADHISIVE WAS NOT APPLIED RIGHT AND ARE SEPERATING FROM THE ALLOY WHEELS. THEY COULD POSSIBLY   SEPERATE FROM THE WHEEL AND CAUSE AN ACCIDENT OR HURT SOMBODY.
